title: Bubble with Global Monopole
abstract: The first-order phase transition of $O(3)$ symmetric model is considered in the limit of high temperature. It is shown that this model supports a new bubble solution where the global monopole is formed at the center of the buble in addition to the ordinary $O(3)$ bubble. Though the free energy of it is larger than that of normal bubble, the production rate can considerably large at high temperatures.
